statements: DELETE FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE episode_number = 5 AND air_date = '2022-05-10';
DELETE FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE runtime > 30 OR title LIKE '%Special%';

DELETE FROM episodes WHERE episode_number = 5 AND air_date < '2020-01-01';
